note.p: Career: Came to England (1792); articled to a solicitor in Gray's Inn; practised as a solicitor; involved in the foundation of London University and was on its first council (1823); MP for Truro (1832-1837)
Obituaries: Proc Roy Soc 1863-1864 vol 13 pp vi-vii
References: J H Appleby, 'The founding of St Petersburg in the context of the Royal Society's relationship with Russia' in NR 2003 vol 57 pp 273-284
